plugins\/enedis\/plugin_info\/configurat.Cliquez sur l'image pour autoriser la li: Click on the image to authorize the link between your Jeedom market account and Enedis

plugins\/enedis\/desktop\/php\/enedis.ph.Aucun compteur Enedis trouvé, cliquer su: No Enedis meter found, click on "Add" to start
plugins\/enedis\/desktop\/php\/enedis.ph.Indiquer le numéro d'identification du p: Indicate the identification number of the delivery point (14 characters)
plugins\/enedis\/desktop\/php\/enedis.ph.Indiquer le type de mesure à récupérer (: Indicate the type of measure to be recovered (consumption, production or both)
plugins\/enedis\/desktop\/php\/enedis.ph.Cocher la case si vous n'avez pas activé: Check the box if you have not activated the recording and collection of hourly consumption on your Enedis account
plugins\/enedis\/desktop\/php\/enedis.ph.Cocher la case pour utiliser le template: Check the box to use the widget template representing the Linky counter

plugins\/enedis\/desktop\/js\/enedis.js.Intégrer les historiques de la date choi: Integrate the histories of the chosen date until January 1
plugins\/enedis\/desktop\/js\/enedis.js.Intégrer les historiques horaires jusqu\: Integrate hourly histories up to 7 days after the chosen date
plugins\/enedis\/desktop\/js\/enedis.js.En cours d\\'intégration d\\'historiques: In the process of integrating histories

plugins\/enedis\/core\/class\/enedis.cla.Tâche supprimée car équipement non trouv: Task deleted because equipment not found
plugins\/enedis\/core\/class\/enedis.cla.Début d'interrogation des serveurs Enedi: Start of polling of Enedis servers
plugins\/enedis\/core\/class\/enedis.cla.Données journalières déjà enregistrées p: Daily data already recorded for the
plugins\/enedis\/core\/class\/enedis.cla.Données horaires déjà enregistrées pour: Hourly data already recorded for the
plugins\/enedis\/core\/class\/enedis.cla.Données de puissance déjà enregistrées p: Power data already recorded for the
plugins\/enedis\/core\/class\/enedis.cla.Fin d'interrogation des serveurs Enedis: End of polling of Enedis servers
plugins\/enedis\/core\/class\/enedis.cla.L'identifiant du point de livraison (PDL: The delivery point identifier (PDL) must be entered
The delivery point identifier (PDL) must contain 14 characters

info.json.Récupérez les informations de consommati:
Retrieve the consumption information of your smart electricity meters from your Enedis customer account. All you need to do is authorize the sharing of data with Jeedom and indicate the identification number of the Delivery Point (PDL) concerned.

The plugin returns hourly, daily, monthly, annual measurements as well as the maximum power both in consumption and in production.
NB: The most recent data received by Enedis relate to the day before the current day
